name: Basic Horoscope and Numerology
description: Vedic Rishi Free APIs for Basic Astrological and Horoscope Details along with numerous Numerological details. It also provides panchang or hindu/indian calendar details.

utterances.utterance: Can you give me a detailed numerology report?
I need a numerology analysis for my birth date.
What does my numerology chart say?
Please provide me with a numerology reading.
I’d like to know my numerology details.
Could you generate a numerology report for me?
What’s my numerology forecast?
Can I get a numerology breakdown?
Tell me about my numerology numbers.
I want to see my numerology insights.

api_methods.name: Birth Details
api_methods.description: Along with birth details it provides sunrise, sunset, ayanamsha as well.

utterances.utterance: Can you provide my birth details along with sunrise and sunset times?
I need information about my birth details and the ayanamsha.
What are my birth details and the sunrise time for today?
Could you give me my birth details and the sunset time?
I’d like to know my birth details and the current ayanamsha.
Please provide my birth details along with the sunrise and sunset times.
Can you tell me my birth details and the ayanamsha for today?
I need my birth details and the sunset time for today.
What are my birth details and the sunrise time?
Could you provide my birth details along with the ayanamsha and sunset time?

api_methods.name: Basic Astrological Details
api_methods.description: Provides the complete avakahada details e.g. nakshtatra, charan, tithi, karan, yog ,varna, vashaya, yoni, etc

utterances.utterance: Can you give me my complete astrological details?
What are my nakshatra and charan details?
I need information about my tithi and karan.
Could you provide me with my yog and varna details?
Tell me about my vashaya and yoni.
What does my avakahada chart say?
Can I get a summary of my astrological details?
Provide me with my panchang details.
What are the key astrological elements in my chart?
I’d like to know my complete horoscope details.

api_methods.name: Basic panchang details at the time of sunrise
api_methods.description: Provides data points for panchang elements, chaugadiya and sunrise and set time at he time of  sunrise.

utterances.utterance: Can you give me the panchang details for sunrise today?
What are the panchang elements at sunrise on January 1st?
I need the sunrise panchang details for tomorrow.
Could you provide the panchang details at sunrise for next Monday?
What does the panchang say for sunrise on my birthday, March 15th?
Please fetch the panchang details at sunrise for December 25th.
Can I get the panchang information for sunrise on the summer solstice?
What are the panchang details at sunrise for the first day of Diwali?
I’d like to know the panchang elements at sunrise for the upcoming full moon.
Could you tell me the panchang details at sunrise for the next equinox?

api_methods.name: Basic panchang details
api_methods.description: Provides data points for panchang elements, and sunrise and set timings.

utterances.utterance: What are the panchang details for today?
Can you tell me the sunrise and sunset timings?
